q: : Michael Vick Given Key To City Of Dallas, Confronted by Owner of Ex-Fighting Dog Over Super Bowl Weekend, Eagles Quarterback Michael Vick was in Dallas where it was announced he'd received the Associated Press award for Comeback Player of the Year. Dallas Mayor Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway also gave Michael Vick a key to the city- apparently, without the mayor's approval- which has incited a minor uproar in Dallas and beyond. David Cameron dismissed questioning about his judgment over Andy Coulson .` Excellent Job' "He's run the Downing Street press office in a professional, competent and good way," David Cameron told Sky. He's done an excellent, excellent job. I think he should be judged by that. This is all about the past. It's just gone on and on. ( Donald Rumsfeld also denounces the widespread press accounts that Eric Shinseki was forced to retire early for testifying shortly before the war began that "several hundred thousand soldiers" would be needed. This hardened into a myth that he was punished for telling the truth about the war, the author writes.)
